mapper.sql: id, owner_id, create_date, size, title, house_detail, address, prior_approval, house_type, rent_price, region_id, hall, room, facilities, update_time, house_status, rent_type, features, start_top_time, end_top_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fd_house
order by ${orderByClause}

select h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall,h.room,h.title, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.title, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id,h.facilities,h.update_time, h.house_status, h.rent_type, h.features, r1.region_name as 'area',r2.region_name as 'district',r3.region_name as 'city', u.username as 'owner' from fd_house h left join fd_user u on h.owner_id=u.id left join fd_region r1 on h.region_id = r1.id left join fd_region r2 on r1.parent_reg_id=r2.id left join fd_region r3 on r2.parent_reg_id=r3.id where h.id=#{id}

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, h.title, h.facilities, h.update_time, h.house_status, h.rent_type, h.features, u.username AS 'owner', r.region_name AS 'area' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_user u ON h.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r ON h.region_id = r.id

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, h.title, h.facilities, u.username AS 'owner', r.region_name AS 'area' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_user u ON h.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r ON h.region_id = r.id WHERE h.owner_id= #{userId}

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.title, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, r1.region_name AS 'area', r2.region_name AS 'district', r3.region_name AS 'city', u.username AS 'owner' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_region r1 ON h.region_id = r1.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r2 ON r1.parent_reg_id = r2.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r3 ON r2.parent_reg_id = r3.id LEFT JOIN fd_user u ON h.owner_id = u.id WHERE (r1.region_name LIKE "%" #{key}"%" or r2.region_name LIKE "%" #{key}"%" or r3.region_name LIKE "%" #{key}"%" or h.house_detail LIKE "%" #{key}"%" or h.address LIKE "%" #{key}"%" or h.title LIKE "%" #{key}"%") and r3.id=#{regionId}

select * from (select h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall,h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id,r1.region_name as 'area',r2.region_name as 'district',r3.region_name as 'city' ,h.title,(@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as row_no from fd_house h left join fd_region r1 on h.region_id = r1.id left join fd_region r2 on r1.parent_reg_id=r2.id left join fd_region r3 on r2.parent_reg_id=r3.id ,(select (@rowNum:=0)) x where r3.id=1 and now() between h.start_top_time and h.end_top_time ) z where row_no in
#{num} ;
select count(*) from fd_house where prior_approval=1;

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, r1.region_name AS 'area', r2.region_name AS 'district' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_region r1 ON h.region_id = r1.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r2 ON r1.parent_reg_id = r2.id WHERE r2.region_name = #{district} limit 0,3;

SELECT h.id, h.owner_id, h.create_date, h.size, h.hall, h.room, h.house_detail, h.address, h.prior_approval, h.house_type, h.rent_price, h.region_id, h.title, h.facilities, h.update_time, h.house_status, h.rent_type, h.features, u.username AS 'owner', r.region_name AS 'area' FROM fd_house h LEFT JOIN fd_user u ON h.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN fd_region r ON h.region_id = r.id order by h.prior_approval desc,h.update_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into fd_house (id, owner_id, create_date, size, title, house_detail, address, prior_approval, house_type, rent_price, region_id, hall, room, facilities, update_time, house_status, rent_type, features, start_top_time, end_top_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into fd_house
id,
owner_id,
create_date,
size,
title,
house_detail,
address,
prior_approval,
house_type,
rent_price,
region_id,
hall,
room,
facilities,
update_time,
house_status,
rent_type,
features,
start_top_time,
end_top_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update fd_house
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner_id = #{record.ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
size = #{record.size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_detail = #{record.houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prior_approval = #{record.priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_type = #{record.houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent_price = #{record.rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hall = #{record.hall,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room = #{record.room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facilities = #{record.facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
house_status = #{record.houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent_type = #{record.rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
features = #{record.features,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_top_time = #{record.startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_top_time = #{record.endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update fd_house set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner_id = #{record.ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, size = #{record.size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_detail = #{record.houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prior_approval = #{record.priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_type = #{record.houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent_price = #{record.rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_id = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hall = #{record.hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room = #{record.room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facilities = #{record.facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, house_status = #{record.houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent_type = #{record.rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, features = #{record.features,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_top_time = #{record.startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_top_time = #{record.endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update fd_house
owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_detail = #{houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prior_approval = #{priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent_price = #{rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hall = #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facilities = #{facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
house_status = #{houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent_type = #{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
features = #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_top_time = #{startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_top_time = #{endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fd_house set owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_detail = #{houseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prior_approval = #{priorApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent_price = #{rentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hall = #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facilities = #{facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, house_status = #{houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent_type = #{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, features = #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_top_time = #{startTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_top_time = #{endTopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update fd_house set update_time=now() where id=#{id};
